sentences.en: First Name contains reserved or ineligible word.
sentences.cn: 名字中包含了保留的或不恰当的词汇.

sentences.en: His conflict of interest made him ineligible for the post.
sentences.cn: 他本身的利益冲突使他不适合那个职位.

sentences.en: Last Name contains reserved or ineligible word.
sentences.cn: 姓氏中包含了保留的或不恰当的词汇.

sentences.en: Only applicable to students aged 18 or above who are ineligible to act as the applicant.
sentences.cn: 只适用于年满18岁或以上但未能成为申请人之学生.

sentences.en: Quickname contains reserved or ineligible word.
sentences.cn: 昵称中包含了保留的或不恰当的词汇.

sentences.en: Roman Pavlyuchenko and Vedran are ineligible for the UEFA Cup and have stayed in London.
sentences.cn: 帕夫柳琴科和乔尔卢卡因为规则问题,所以不能参赛(欧洲联盟杯的比赛),因此他们留在伦敦.

sentences.en: Sign - In Name contains reserved or ineligible word.
sentences.cn: “登录名”中包含保留字或不符合要求的字.

sentences.en: Tenders with an ineligible valid period shall be rejected as non - responsive tenders.
sentences.cn: 投标有效期不满足要求的投标将被视为 非 响应性投标而予以拒绝.

sentences.en: The good news is that only few people, such as pregnant women, are ineligible for treatment.
sentences.cn: 好消息是只有少数人, 如孕妇, 不适合这种治疗.

sentences.en: They were ineligible to remain in the U.S.
sentences.cn: 他们没有资格继续留在美国了。

words.tran_cn: 不合宜；不适任；无被选资格
无资格的,不可取的,不合格的

trans.tran_cn: 无入选资格的，不合格的，无被选权
trans.tran_en: not allowed to have or do something because of a law or rule
